pageProps.title: spacy-clausie
pageProps.teaser: Implementation of the ClausIE information extraction system for Python+spaCy

data.title: spacy-clausie
data.slogan: Implementation of the ClausIE information extraction system for Python+spaCy
data.description: ClausIE, a novel, clause-based approach to open information extraction, which extracts relations and their arguments from natural language text
code_example: doc = nlp("AE died in Princeton in 1955.")
# <SV, AE, died, None, None, None, [in Princeton, in 1955]>
# [AE died in Princeton in 1955, AE died in 1955, AE died in Princeton
data.author: Emmanouil Theofanis Chourdakis
